programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Ghoul Spirit: Gwen rejects the friendship of a friendly ghost. (S2 Ep35)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Duncan Carving: Duncan takes advantage of a questionable Halloween legend to steal candy from his classmates. (S2 Ep36)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Baby Brother Blues: When Beth is told that the impending arrival of a baby brother is about to ruin her life, she runsaway to find a new family. (S2 Ep37)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Space Codyty: Izzy, convinced that Cody is an alien, embarks on a journey through space to take him back home. (S2 Ep38)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gobble Head: Chef accidentally cooks up a killer cyborg turkey in a failed attempt to get the kids to appreciate him on Appreciation Day. (S2 Ep39)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Snack To The Future: Owen wants his favourite treat, 'Jiggle Giggle', so bad that he's uses a time machine to get to snack time quicker. (S2 Ep40)

programme.title: Miraculous:...
programme.desc: ...Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir. Terrificator: Marinette's class has to make a short horror film, but the lead actress is too scared to play her part. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Miraculous:...
programme.desc: ...Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir. The Puppeteer: Marinette is looking after Manon once again. But things get a bit hectic when Manon is falsely accused of stealing a doll. (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Miraculous:...
programme.desc: ...Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir. The Mime: Fred was supposed to play a mime at the premiere of a show, but his stand-in betrays him to take his place! (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Miraculous:...
programme.desc: ...Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir. Guitar Villain: Jagged Stone goes to extreme lengths when he can't tolerate the provocations of an arrogant young singer called Mr XY. (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Rogue Beasticon: Since breaking away from the Crimson Lord, Xinyan hates humans. When he gets a Shard that brings out people's animal nature, he wants to make a Human Zoo. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Not for the Paint of Heart: When Izzy believes that Chef wants her to "Rise to the Challenge" of destroying the daycare with art, she gets some magic paint to bring her creations to life. (S3 Ep33)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Daycare of Rock: After believing he's turned Chef to stone Duncan sets his sights on ultimate chaos only to discover there's no joy in victory without an adversary. (S3 Ep34)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Tree Stooges Save Christmas - Part 1: The kids accidentally destroy Chef's decorated Christmas tree. So they go on an epic mission to replace his holiday treasures. (S3 Ep35)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Tree Stooges Save Christmas PT2: The kids accidentally destroy Chef's decorated Christmas tree. So they go on an epic mission to replace his holiday treasures. (S3 Ep36)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Aches & Ladders: When MacArthur has a bad fall in the school, the kids' recollections of the event are just as weird as they are. (S3 Ep37)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cactus Makes Perfect: Cody's friends become concerned when he forms a new friendship with a cactus. (S3 Ep38)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Virtual Reality Bites: When the school switches to virtual reality, Harold uses the opportunity to get the respect he feels he rightfully deserves. (S3 Ep39)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Opening Act: After failing to open a jar Chef believes he's entering his twilight years. This prompts Beth and the kids to dig up something from his youth to rejuvenate him. (S3 Ep40)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Rocketear: As Guardian of the Miraculous, Ladybug must make difficult decisions which affect the people around her. (S4 Ep17)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Wishmaker: As Marinette thinks about her future, a supervillain shows up in Paris. Able to make people live their childhood dreams, he turns into a nightmare for our heroes. (S4 Ep18)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Simplificator: A relative of Marinette's is akumatized into Simplificator, a supervillain determined to simplify this overly complex world. (S4 Ep19)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug and Cat Noir: Qilin
programme.desc: : Because of one of Marinette's careless mistakes, one of her closest relatives is akumatized into Qilin, a fearsome supervillain. Will Ladybug dare to fight her? (S4 Ep20)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Gravity: A Shard in Gram-Gram's dice is the centre of gravity. When the dice roll, so does the city! The stakes of a Mahjong game couldn't be higher. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Mooshy Mon Mons: After eating Chef's extremely rare and expensive chocolates, Courtney drags Owen, Izzy and Beth all the way to the Norberian Alps of Fruffenberg to replace them. (S2 Ep9)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Student Becomes The Teacher: Chef is knocked unconscious right before a school board evaluator shows up for a big review. Now Owen has to fill in so Chef doesn't lose his teaching licence. (S2 Ep10)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Beth And The Beanstalk: After having a chocolate bar confiscated by Chef, Beth finds herself in a parallel giant world and aims to get back her now giant chocolate bar. (S2 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The A-bok-bok-bokalypse: When chicken pox sweeps through the school, the kids visit the Chicken Queen to apologise for past misdeeds and hopefully procure an antidote before it's too late! (S2 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Pinata Regatta: Izzy can't bring herself to smash a pinata during Cinco de Mayo celebrations. But when that unsmashed pinata comes to life and spawns an evil pinata army, it's batter up. (S2 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Dame-gerous Game: After Leshawna, Bridgette, Owen and Cody win a hide and seek contest, they're trapped on a private island by a jealous ex-champion and forced to play for their freedom. (S2 Ep14)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Royal Flush: When the other kids fear Harold has accidentally flushed himself down Chef's fancy new toilet, they travel into the sewer on a rescue mission. (S2 Ep15)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Total Eclipse Of The Fart: After accidentally swallowing her first loose tooth and fearing that means no cash under the pillow, Leshawna tries to capture the tooth fairy. (S2 Ep16)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Frozer: Figure skating trainer Philippe gets akumatized. Armed with evil skates, he wants to turn Paris into a Kingdom of Ice. (S2 Ep17)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Style Queen: Chloe's mother gets akumatized into Style Queen. Armed with a sceptre and determined to get revenge, she attacks Adrien. (S2 Ep18)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of...
programme.desc: ...Ladybug & Cat Noir: Queen Wasp: Chloe gets akumatized into Queen Wasp. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir manage to stop this superhero turned supervillain? (S2 Ep19)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Troublemaker: A rock star is scheduled to visit the bakery owned by Marinette's parents, but his overwhelmed personal assistant is akumatized by Hawk Moth. (S2 Ep20)

programme.title: Jade Armor

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.desc: Mae cawl newydd Sin mor boblogaidd, mae'n rhedeg yn fyr o gynhwysion. Mae Izzy'n achub y dydd gydag awgrym blasus iawn. Izzy improvises when Sin's new soup proves so popular it runs out!

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Jams, Mandy a Norman gyda'i gilydd ar Arwr y Mynydd gyda Moose. Today, Jams, Mandy and Norman are together on the Mountain Hero with Moose.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae'r Octonots yn brwydro drwy gors i achub fflamingo bach cyn iddo gael ei ddal gan ysglyfaethwyr llwglyd! The Octonauts wade through a swamp to find a lost flamingo chick.

programme.title: New: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Harri gets a call from Lisa and her father - their welding machine has broken and Harri goes to help. Mae Harri'n cael galwad gan Lisa a'i thad gan fod y peiriant weldio wedi torri.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'r Cymylaubychain mewn hwyliau creadigol iawn heddiw, pawb heblaw am Baba Glas. All the Cymylaubychain are in a creative mood apart from Baba Glas who doesn't know what to do.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae pob math o bethau anghyffredin yn cael eu dwyn ar hyd a lled Pen Cyll. Unusual items are being taken from all over Applecross. Digby decides to track down the mysterious taker.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod gwlyb a gwyntog ar Fferm y Waun ac mae Pwsi Meri Mew yn ceisio cadw'n sych - ond mae'r gwynt yn cipio ei hymbarl! It's a wet, windy day at Fferm y Waun for Pwsi Meri Mew!

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae'r Abadas yn edrych ymlaen at chwarae gm y geiriau. 'Berfa' yw'r gair newydd heddiw. The Abadas are looking forward to playing the word game. Today's word is 'wheelbarrow'.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Croeso i'r Arctig. Gwisgwch yn gynnes! Mae'r Tralalas yn gweld yr anifeiliaid anhygoel sy'n byw yno. Welcome to the Arctic where the Tralalas see lots of amazing animals that live there.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Ar ddiwrnod pen-blwydd Maer Oci mae Blero'n methu credu bod morgrugyn wedi dwyn y gacen ben-blwydd! It's the day of Mayor Oci's birthday picnic and an ant sneaks away with the cake!

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen! Welcome to a new series of Jambor!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Joni wrth ei fodd 'i rl fel arwr. Ond rhaid cofio beth mae'n olygu i fod yn arwr er mwyn llwyddo. Joni loves his role as a hero but must remember what it means to be a hero to succeed.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Glan Morfa sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Glan Morfa join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Tib, Lalw a Bobl yn ymweld Hen Gloc y Goedwig - y peth hynaf yn y goedwig, nd mae wedi stopio... Tib, Lalloo and Bobble visit the Old Forest Clock - the oldest thing in the forest!

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Ar l ymweliad at y barbwr, mae Lewis eisiau gwybod 'Pam bod fy ngwallt yn tyfu?'. After a visit to the barber's, Lewis wants to know why his hair grows? Tadcu has an answer.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Harri gets a call to the Loggerheads park. He and Aled fix the bug hotel making sure the caterpillar has a safe home. Mae Harri'n cael galwad i barc Loggerheads i drwsio gwesty'r pryfed.

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Dechrau'r cystadlu ynghyd a'r holl newyddion a gwybodaeth angenrheidiol ar ail fore'r Wyl. The start of the competitions plus news and information on the second morning of the Eisteddfod.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.desc: Cystadlaethau plant hyn yr ysgolion cynradd o'r pafiliynau a'r canlyniadau diweddaraf o Lwyfan y Cyfrwy gyda Mari Lovgreen. Competitions for older primary school children from the pavilions.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Seremoni'r Dydd: Medal Drama
programme.desc: Uchafbwynt y dydd yn y 'Steddfod: darllediad byw o brif Seremoni'r dydd, Y Fedal Ddrama. Highlight of the day at the Eisteddfod: a live broadcast of the day's main ceremony, The Drama Medal.

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Gweddill cystadlaethau plant hyn yr ysgolion cynradd yng nghwmni Trystan a Heledd. The rest of the competitions for primary school older children, with Trystan Ellis Morris & Heledd Cynwal.

programme.title: Cymry ar Gynfas
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, yr artist graffeg Steffan Dafydd sy'n mynd ati i greu portread o'r cerddor Mei Gwynedd. This time, graphic designer Steffan Dafydd creates a portrait of the musician Mei Gwynedd.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Ni'n fyw o Gerddi Bodnant i ddathlu'r Tresi Aur, ac mae Jon Gower yn westai ar y soffa. We're live from Bodnant Gardens celebrating the Golden Chains, and Jon Gower is a guest on the sofa.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau Dydd Mawrth Eisteddfod yr Urdd Dur a Mr 2025; hefyd, mae Lily Beau yn crwydro'r maes. Highlights from today's Urdd Eisteddfod 2025, plus Lily Beau roams the Eisteddfod field.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Cynefin: Port Talbot
programme.desc: Port Talbot. Bydd Heledd Cynwal yn cael gwersi bocsio ag yn bwydo ceirw ym mharc Margam. Sin Tomos Owen will be spray painting graffiti and Ffion Dafis will be making Welsh cakes.

programme.title: Rygbi Cymru yn Ewrop 30
programme.desc: Gyda Rygbi Ewrop yn dathlu carreg filltir nodedig, dyma raglen gyda uchafbwyntiau'r gystadleuaeth drwy'r degawdau. As European Rugby celebrates 30 years, here are the competition highlights.

programme.title: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau Dydd Mawrth Eisteddfod yr Urdd Dur a Mr 2025; hefyd, mae Lily Beau yn crwydro'r maes. Highlights from today's Urdd Eisteddfod 2025, plus Lily Beau roams the Eisteddfod field.

programme.title: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau Dydd Mawrth Eisteddfod yr Urdd Dur a Mr 2025; hefyd, mae Lily Beau yn crwydro'r maes. Highlights from today's Urdd Eisteddfod 2025, plus Lily Beau roams the Eisteddfod field.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Home Shopping.

programme.title: ..programmes start at 6.00am
programme.desc: ..programmes start at 6.00am

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Brown yn mynd 'r Blociau Lliw ar antur i'r goedwig. Brown takes the Colourblocks exploring in the forest.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Pa anifeiliaid fyddwn ni'n dysgu amdan heddiw, tybed? Which animals are we going to be meeting today?

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Benja a Nel yn mynd ar goll yn y goedwig wrth chwarae pi-po. When Benja and Nel get lost in the woods during a game of peek-a-boo, can they elude a prowling Mr Cadno?

programme.title: Amser Maith Maith yn l
programme.desc: Ma Tadcu yn trio trwsio ei beiriant golchi cyn i Ceti ddod am stori. Pa mor wahanol oedd golchi dillad adeg y Rhyfel Byd Cyntaf? Grandad tries to fix his washing machine before Ceti arrives.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Heddiw mae Pablo yn darganfod weithiau nid yw ei wyneb yn dweud wrth bawb sut mae o'n teimlo. Pablo is surprised to learn that his face is saying things to people he doesn't know about!

programme.title: New: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod trafod dy wyliau yn yr ysgol heddiw a phawb wedi dod swfenr o wyliau neu ddiwrnod bant i'w drafod yn y dosbarth. It's time to share their holiday memories in school today!

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Twm yn cynnal noson arswydus i'w ffrindiau! On today's poptastic adventure, Plom is having a spooky sleepover for his friends!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd Shani y poni ac Annie a'i chwn defaid. Today we meet Shani the pony and Annie and her sheep dogs.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae gan y Capten botel ddiddorol, mae Seren yn chwarae photiau halen a phupur, ac mae Fflwff yn mwynhau powlenaid o gawl. Today, the Captain has an interesting bottle...

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae'r teulu'n dweud y drefn wrth Stiw am wneud gormod o swn, felly mae'n penderfynu gadael cartre'. Stiw is told he is making too much noise, so he decides to leave home.

programme.title: Dathlu 'Da Dona
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Tomos yn cael parti chwaraeon gyda Huw Cyw. Today, Tomos will be having a sports party with Huw from Cyw.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd y cwn bach heddiw? What's happening in the Paw Patrol world today?

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: A fydd Tryfan yn llwyddo i neidio nol ar gefn ei feic mynydd i gystadlu yn y ras ar ei ddiwrnod mawr? Tryfan's a daring mountain biker, but will he get back in the saddle for his big day?

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Hwiangerdd draddodiadol am lwynog coch yn cysgu ac yna'n deffro'n barod am ddiwrnod hyfryd. A traditional lullaby about a red fox sleeping soundly before waking up, ready for another day.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: I ble ma Hen Begor yn sleifio'n gyfrinachol bob wythnos? Mae Twm Twrch a Dorti yn penderfynu ei ddilyn. Where is Hen Begor sneaking off each week? Twm Twrch and Dorti decide to follow him.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu a throi sbwriel yn sbeshal, a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Today, Ben Dant will be joining pupils at Ysgol Beca to create excellent treasure.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan mae Gwich a'i frawd yn mynd charafn Crawc ar daith drwy gefn gwlad buan iawn mae ffrae yn codi rhwng y brodyr. Sibling jealousies rise to the surface when Gwich goes on holiday.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae Deian yn chwaraewr hunanol ac yn gwrthod pashio'r bl! Will Deian and Loli be able to help the Blues or will Deian's selfish tendencies with the ball stop them from getting victory?!

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, awn i Sbaen i gwrdd a'r Wenynen Feirch ac i Awstralia er mwyn cael cwrdd a'r Ecidna. We're off to Spain to meet the Wasp and to Australia to get to know the Echidna.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae cerdyn post o Hawaii gan Wncwl Wil yn ysbrydoli Anni a Lili i ail greu Hawaii yn y gegin! A postcard from Hawaii from Uncle Wil inspires Anni and Lili to create Hawaii in the kitchen!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd Dilys y cocyrpw ac Aneira a'i chrwbanod. Today we meet Dilys the cockerpoo and Aneira and her tortoises.

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Dechrau'r cystadlu ynghyd a'r holl newyddion a gwybodaeth angenrheidiol ar drydydd bore'r Wyl. The start of the competition along with all the news and information on the third morning.

programme.title: Seremoni'r Dydd: Medal Dysgwyr
programme.desc: Uchafbwynt y dydd - darllediad byw o brif seremoniau'r dydd, Medal y Dysgwyr a Bobi Jones. A live broadcast of the day's main Ceremonies, the Learners' Medal and Bobi Jones.

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Gweddill cystadlaethau disgyblion iau yr ysgolion uwchradd, gyda Trystan Ellis Morris ac Heledd Cynwal ar drydydd diwrnod y 'Steddfod. The rest of the secondary school juniors' competitions.

programme.title: Arfordir Cymru: Sir Benfro
programme.desc: Mae rhaglen ola'r gyfres yn mynd ni o Angle hyd at ddiwedd llwybr yr arfordir yn Amroth. The final episode takes us from Angle all the way to the end of the coastal path in Amroth.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Ry' ni'n ymuno yn yr hwyl yng Ngwyl y Gelli, a chawn sgwrs gyda'r gantores, Rhian Jorj. We join in the fun at the Hay Festival, and have a chat with singer, Rhian Jorj.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau Dydd Mercher Eisteddfod yr Urdd Dur a Mr 2025, ac mae Lily Beau yn crwydro'r maes. Highlights of the Wednesday at the Urdd Eisteddfod 2025, plus Lily Beau wanders the field.

programme.title: Prosiect Pum Mil
programme.desc: Mae'r criw yn nhref Rhydaman yr wythnos hon i helpu cangen Derwen Newydd o elusen y Wallich. The gang are in Ammanford this week to help the Derwen Newydd branch of the Wallich charity.

programme.title: Guinness World Records Cymru 2025
programme.desc: Ymdrechion i dorri recordiau Guinness World Records Cymru 2025: menywod cryf yn tynnu Injan, blodau diri, raff trapeze, a mwy! We follow attempts to break Guinness World Records Cymru 2025.

programme.title: A Matter of Choice
programme.desc: 1963. Crime Drama. Director: Vernon Sewell. Stars Anthony Steel, Jeanne Moody & Ballard Berkeley. 2 youths accidentally cause a man's death and inadvertently reveal his liaison with a married woman.

programme.title: Firewalker
programme.desc: 1986. Action. Directed by J. Lee Thompson. Stars Chuck Norris, Louis Gossett Jr. & Melody Anderson. Two adventurers embark on a quest for gold after meeting a woman who possesses a treasure map. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance: To Kill a Man
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Directed by James Neilson. Stars Alexis Smith, Scott Forbes, Dan Barton & Ross Elliott. A dinner party is unexpectedly interrupted by an intruder.

programme.title: Look At Life Early Starters
programme.desc: 1965. A compelling look at some of the independent and local government-sponsored nursery schools in Britain.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Mr. Earp Meets a Lady. 1955. Stars Hugh O'Brian, Richard Travis & Gloria Talbott. Wyatt tries to reduce the chances of violence when a fellow marshal romances a woman whose boyfriend is an outlaw. [S]

programme.title: The Man In The Mirror
programme.desc: 1936. Drama with Edward Everett-Horton & Alastair Sim. A timid businessman, while looking into his mirror, is confronted by his alter ego. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed at the end of May and beginning of June. [S]

programme.title: Marilyn
programme.desc: 1953. Crime drama directed by Wolf Rilla and starring Maxwell Reed and Sandra Dorne. The wife of the garage owner is caught with the mechanic, when he is accidentally killed and a cover up begins. [S]

programme.title: Guilty?
programme.desc: 1956. Crime. A Solicitor (John Justin) is convinced that a wartime heroine is innocent of a murder charge but he uncovers more than the evidence he needs. Stars Donald Wolfit & Sydney Tafler. [S]

programme.title: Identity Unknown
programme.desc: 1960. War Drama. Directed by Frank Marshall. Stars Richard Wyler, Pauline Yates, Patricia Plunkett. Two reporters develop a relationship while investigating an aircraft accident. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Men Against the Sea
programme.desc: 1965. For centuries the Dutch have fought against the sea. This film takes a look at the Delta Plan - a spectacular sea-defence scheme in Holland, and what it aims to achieve.

programme.title: Beyond the Time Barrier
programme.desc: 1960. Sci-fi. Directed by Edgar G. Ulmer. Stars Robert Clarke & Darlene Tompkins. A military test pilot is propelled into the future where he finds a plague has sterilised the world's population. [S]

programme.title: What Every Woman Wants
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Director: Maurice Elvey. Stars Brian Rix, Prunella Scales & Joan Sims. A newlywed couple with no home are forced to live with their parents and are never permitted a moment's privacy. [S]

programme.title: Devil Girl From Mars
programme.desc: 1954. Sci-Fi. Directed by David MacDonald. Stars Patricia Laffan, Hugh McDermott & Hazel Court. A female alien, accompanied by a menacing robot, comes to Earth to collect men as breeding stock. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: The Death Trap. 1962. Directed by John Moxey. Stars Albert Lieven, Barbara Shelley & Mercy Haystead. Carol Haisten discovers her sister withdrew 7,000 before she died. It is now missing. [S]

programme.title: Man from Interpol
programme.desc: No Other Way. 1960. Stars Richard Stapley, Peter Howell & Nancy Nevinson. Agent Anthony Smith investigates a painter living in Italy, who may be a British traitor. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Ma Parker. 1966. Stars Adam West & Shelley Winters. After finding a bomb in the Batmobile, Batman and Robin rush back to the prison to check on The Parkers, but all seems suspiciously well. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Old Soldiers Sometimes Die. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, A.J. Brown & Ray Cooney. After a tourist is conned in London, Maguire goes undercover as an American tourist to catch the perpetrators. [S]

programme.title: Scandal Sheet (1952)
programme.desc: 1952. Crime. Directed by Phil Karlson. Stars John Derek, Donna Reed & Broderick Crawford. A newspaper editor accidentally kills his ex-wife and his protg is assigned to investigate the story. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Tonight, Caroline Munro is joined by demonic forces and the extraterrestrial down in The Cellar Club. First, is the 1980 sci-fi horror Without Warning starring Jack Palance and Martin Landau. [S]

programme.title: Without Warning
programme.desc: 1980. Horror. Directed by Greydon Clark. Stars Jack Palance, Martin Landau & Tarah Nutter. When a group of teenagers go on a camping trip, they find much more than just the great outdoors. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Evil forces are at work and ready to destroy lives in Caroline Munro's next chilling film of the evening, the 1995 horror Serpent's Lair. [S]

programme.title: Serpent's Lair
programme.desc: 1995. Horror. Director: Jeffrey Reiner. Stars Jeff Fahey, Heather Medway & Kathleen Noone. Shortly after a young couple move into their new home, their marriage becomes plagued by a Satanic force. [S]

programme.title: Serpent's Lair
programme.desc: 1995. Horror. Director: Jeffrey Reiner. Stars Jeff Fahey, Heather Medway & Kathleen Noone. Shortly after a young couple move into their new home, their marriage becomes plagued by a Satanic force. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Tales of vengeance and murder are on the cards for next week, as Caroline Munro gives us a sneaky peek at the upcoming films. [S]

programme.title: Hammer House of Mystery and Suspense
programme.desc: Child's Play. 1984. Stars Mary Crosby, Nicholas Clay & Debbie Chasan. A family awakens to find themselves trapped in their own home and must quickly find a way to escape. [S]

programme.title: Scarlet Street
programme.desc: 1945. Drama. Director: Fritz Lang. Stars Edward G. Robinson, Joan Bennett & Dan Duryea. A banker in a dying marriage falls for a thug's girlfriend. They find a way to cash in on his infatuation. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life The Flying Soldier
programme.desc: 1965. A captivating look at how members of the British army are trained to fly helicopters.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Elly's Animals. 1963. Stars Bea Benaderet, Buddy Ebsen & Eddie Dean. Pearl plans to give music lessons to the people of Beverly Hills but her yodelling upsets the neighbours and Duke the dog. [S]

programme.title: Stagecoach West
programme.desc: A Time To Run. Western starring Wayne Rogers, Richard Eyer & Cesar Romero. A wounded man tries to hijack Luke's stagecoach, but passes out from loss of blood before he can ride away. [S]

programme.title: Jackpot (1960)
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Director Montgomery Tully. Stars William Hartnell, Betty McDowall & Eddie Byrne. An ex-convict learns that his wife is not willing to return to him. A rare screening of a 'lost' film. [S]

programme.title: Chasing the Blues
programme.desc: 1946. An insightful short film about improving post war productivity in the mills with a bit of modern jazz.

programme.title: The Limping Man
programme.desc: 1953. Crime. Frank (Lloyd Bridges), an American, returns to England to see his war-time sweetheart (Moira Lister) but witnesses a shooting whilst leaving the plane. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life The Sweet Life
programme.desc: 1966. An exciting glimpse into Britain's colourful confectionery industry.

programme.title: Not Wanted On Voyage
programme.desc: 1957. Comedy. The rollicking adventures of two stewards aboard a pleasure cruiser. Starring Ronald Shiner and Brian Rix. [S]

programme.title: Tom Brown's Schooldays (1951)
programme.desc: 1951. Starring Robert Newton, John Howard Davis, Sir Michael Hordern and Max Bygraves. A faithful rendition of the Thomas Hughes book of life at the famed Rugby School for Boys. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed at the end of May and beginning of June. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: A Bad Mistake. 1974. Stars Hilary Tindall, Gabrielle Drake & Colin Baker. Ann fears losing everything. Meanwhile, Edward meets prospective shareholders, but his honesty causes a setback. [S]

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: 1951. Western. Directed by Henry Hathaway. Stars Tyrone Power, Susan Hayward & Hugh Marlowe. A stagecoach stop employee and a young woman find themselves at the mercy of four desperate outlaws. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories
programme.desc: Join the amazing Vince Taylor as he performs the entrancing hit Twenty Flight Rock.

programme.title: The Happiness of Three Women
programme.desc: 1954. Comedy. Director: Maurice Elvey. Stars Petula Clark, Donald Houston & Brenda de Banzie. Story of a Welsh postman's efforts to bring happiness into the lives of an assortment of people. [S]

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: Dover Castle/The Psychic Healer. 1994. Michael Aspel introduces more unusual events, including paranormal activities at Dover Castle and Lorraine Ham, a remarkable healer who works with the NHS. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Guilt. 1977. Stars Douglas Fielding & James Ellis. Quilley was at school with Chris Murray and knows he wouldn't hurt a soul, so when Chris pleads guilty to a savage assault, he wants to know why. [S]

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: The Losers. 1970. Stars Alfred Lynch, Robert Hardy & Cyd Hayman. Encouraged by Gratz and aided by the Resistance, Nina, Jimmy and Adelaide hope to escape to England. Can they make it to freedom? [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: The Open Window. 2001. Stars Bruno Cremer, Florence Darel & Jacques Boudet. A shot is heard from the waiting room of a shady financier. Minutes later he is found dead. But was it murder? [S]

programme.title: Things to Come
programme.desc: 1936. Sci-fi. Director: William Cameron Menzies. Stars Raymond Massey, Edward Chapman & Ralph Richardson. Futuristic story about the devastation and struggles of society after a decades-long war. [S]

programme.title: Blind Rage
programme.desc: 1978. Action. Directed by Efren C. Pion. Stars Tony Ferrer, Leo Fong, Fred Williamson & Leila Hermosa. Five unstoppable blind men are recruited to steal $15 million in secret CIA loot. [S]

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Happy Anniversary: Things in the Carson house get a bit crazy when Cory and Chrissy help Mama with a last-minute surprise for Papa. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Mike's Carcade: Cory and Freddie compete against the Clutch Brothers in an epic video game battle of Go! Go! Dance Party. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Flat Tire: Cory gets hurt during Bumperball practice, but doesn't want his injury to prevent him from playing in today's big game. (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Cory's New Bedroom: When Cory gets fed up sharing a bedroom with Chrissy, he packs up and moves into a new room all to himself. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Care Bears: The Bad Crowd...
programme.desc: ...Strikes Back!: A giant flying saucer has begun to intercept all the caring coming from Earth, meaning Care-a-Lot is starting to wither away. The bears blast off into space to see what's going on.

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Blown Away: Masha finds someone's umbrella in the forest and decides to urgently return it. After a fun search, the owner of the umbrella is found, but why is he so dissatisfied? (S6 Ep12)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Who's Gifted?: Christmas is a time of miracles and gifts. All inhabitants prepared performances for Santa Claus, but Masha was the best prepared. Does the wizard have enough gifts for her? (S6 Ep13)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Smells Fishy: Robbery of the century! The ever-hungry Wolves managed to unhook a huge tank for transporting live fish from the train. But there was a strange passenger among the fish. (S6 Ep14)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: That's the Thing!: Bear's closet is full of strange and wildly interesting things. Masha and Panda find a very interesting thing there, which becomes a real puzzle for them! (S6 Ep15)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Fluffy Dessert: The clouds are so airy, so similar to different sweets and, are probably, very tasty! Masha and the Bear decide to take to the skies and try the airy dessert. (S6 Ep16)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Collection Passion: Rosie has a herbarium. Bear has a collection of rare stamps. And what does Masha have? Masha also wants to collect something, but she just can't figure out what exactly. (S6 Ep17)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Super Granny Market: Mustard doesn't have a grandmother to make him snacks. The others feel bad for him, so Ollie draws him a super-granny market. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Sunburn: It's very hot outside, so Ollie draws a fan. It blows away Pamela and Raoul's hat. They set off to find the hat and are chased by a Sunburn, a gigantic monster. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Ugly Dog Nobody Wanted: Petula is furious because her parents won't let her get a pet. Pamela draws her a dog, but she doesn't do a very good job and the dog is ugly. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Strange Wishing Button: Raoul is disappointed. He wrote such a long Christmas list that there's no way he'll get everything he asked for. Ollie draws him a button to help. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Land of The Heebie- Jeebies: Raoul is afraid to ride the ghost train, so Ollie draws him a doppelganger, a "brave Raoul," to set an example for him. Raoul follows in his footsteps. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Little Grey Cloud: Ollie has been swept away by a little grey cloud and has left his magic pencil behind. Mustard uses the pencil to find him. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Didier's Picnic: Billy and Suzie plan to go on a picnic, but to Jean-Claude's annoyance, he has to look after his brother, Didier. They decide to bring Didier along with them to the meadow. (S1 Ep31)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: The King of Butterflies: Billy, Suzie, and Jean-Claude are meant to be meeting for a game of 'hide-n-seek hazelnuts' but Jean-Claude isn't at the designated spot. (S1 Ep32)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: The Legend of Billy: Ollie, Billy's cousin, has come to stay and has brought an instant camera with her. She has decided to do a report on 'Billy, the Super Cowboy of the Wild West'. (S1 Ep33)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Tough Cookie Is Weird: Ollie comes to visit her cousin Billy. She has brought a toy with her that's very fashionable in town: a yo-yo. (S1 Ep34)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Catboy's Magic Trick: Determined to perform a magic trick, Connor finds an ancient teleporting sarcophagus. (S5 Ep17)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Gekko The Croc: Gekko is forced to be a sneaky crocodile instead of a loyal lizard because Pharaoh Boy has taken his friends prisoner. (S5 Ep18)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: The Camping Trip: Greg feels scared on an overnight camping trip. He thinks his night-time powers will help him but Orticia has something worrying in store. (S5 Ep19)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Pondweed Party: Orticia gets invited to Octobella's cave to help grow powerful pondweed. (S5 Ep20)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: A Percival Problem: Gekko won't help Octobella when her shrimp rebels. In fact he makes it worse! (S5 Ep21)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Stop That Spinosaurus!: When a rampaging dinosaur threatens to cause havoc, thanks to Miguel and his observant na-ture, Jon learns that it's better to slow down and think the problem through. (S1 Ep3)
